00116 template<class T>
00117 class CArray2D
00118 {
00119 protected: // attributes
00122     valarray<T>* m_pData;
00124     UINT32 m_Width;
00126         UINT32 m_Height;
00128         ORIGIN m_Origin;
00129 public:
00131         CArray2D();
00135         CArray2D(UINT32 x, UINT32 y);
00137                 CArray2D(const CArray2D<T>& M);
00139                 inline CArray2D& operator=(const CArray2D& M);
00142                 inline CArray2D& operator=(const T& M);
00144         ~CArray2D();
00146                 virtual void Empty();
00149                 inline bool IsEmpty() const;
00154                 virtual bool Alloc(UINT32 x, UINT32 y);
00157         UINT32 Size() const;
00160                 inline ORIGIN GetOrigin() const;
00163         inline UINT32 GetWidth() const;
00166         inline UINT32 GetHeight() const;
00169         inline bool InRange(UINT32 x, UINT32 y) const;
00171         inline bool InRange(const CPoint2D<UINT32>& P) const;
00175                 virtual inline double GetMinX() const;
00179                 virtual inline double GetMinY() const;
00183                 virtual inline double GetMaxX() const;
00187                 virtual inline double GetMaxY() const;
00194                 typedef CArray2DIterator<T> Iterator;
00201                 typedef CArray2DConstIterator<T> ConstIterator;
00206         virtual inline Iterator Row(UINT32 i);
00211         virtual inline ConstIterator ConstRow(UINT32 i) const;
00216         virtual inline Iterator Column(UINT32 i);
00221         virtual inline const ConstIterator ConstColumn(UINT32 i) const;
00224                 virtual inline const T& operator()(const CPoint2D<UINT32>& P) const;
00227                 virtual inline T& operator()(const CPoint2D<UINT32>& P);
00230         virtual inline Iterator operator[](UINT32 i) { return Iterator(m_pData,slice(i*m_Height,m_Height,1)); }   // C-style subscript
00233         virtual inline ConstIterator operator[](UINT32 i) const { return ConstIterator(m_pData,slice(i*m_Height,m_Height,1)); }
00238         inline valarray<T>& Array() { return *m_pData; }
00243         inline const valarray<T>& Array() const { return *m_pData; }
00256                 virtual bool Load(const char* pPathAndFileName);
00267                 virtual bool Save(const char* pPathAndFileName);
00271                 inline void Flush(const T& M);
00283                 virtual bool CopySubArray(const CArray2D<T>& Source,unsigned int xmin,unsigned int ymin, 
00284                                                                                                                         unsigned int xmax,unsigned int ymax);
00294                 virtual bool CopySubArray(const CArray2D<T>& Source,const CPoint2D<unsigned int >& UpperLeft,
00295                                   const CPoint2D<unsigned int >& LowerRight);
00299                 void Rotate90(int Steps);
00302                 void FlipHorisontal();
00305                 void FlipVertical();
00312                 bool CopyDisplace(int dx,int dy);
00326                 friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& s, const CArray2D<T>& Array)
00327                 {
00328                         s << "Dimensions: " << Array.GetWidth() << " " << Array.GetHeight() << endl;
00329                         for(int y=0; y<Array.GetHeight(); y++)
00330                         {
00331                                 for(int x=0; x<Array.GetWidth(); x++)
00332                                         s << Array[x][y] << " ";
00333                                 s << "\n";
00334                         }
00335                         return s;
00336                 }
00343                 friend istream& operator>>(istream& is, ipl::CArray2D<T>& Array)
00344                 {
00345                         UINT32 w,h;
00346                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00347                         is.ignore(std::numeric_limits<int>::max(),std::char_traits<char>::to_int_type(':'));
00348                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00349                         is >> w;
00350                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00351                         is >> h;
00352                         Array.Alloc(w,h);
00353                         for(unsigned int y=0; y<h; y++)
00354                         {
00355                                 for(unsigned int x=0; x<w; x++)
00356                                 {
00357                                         SkipSpaceAndComments(is);
00358                                         //operator[](x)[y] << s;
00359                                         is >> Array.operator[](x)[y];
00360                                 }
00361                         }
00362                         return is;
00363                 }
00364 };

00370 
00371 template <class T>
00372 inline CArray2D<T>& CArray2D<T>::operator=(const CArray2D<T>& M)
00373 {
00374         if (m_pData!=NULL)
00375                 delete m_pData;
00376         if ((M.GetWidth()!=0) && (M.GetHeight()!=0))
00377         {
00378                 m_Width = M.GetWidth();
00379                 m_Height = M.GetHeight();
00380                 m_pData = new valarray<T>(m_Width*m_Height);
00381                 *m_pData=M.Array();
00382                 m_Origin=RAM;
00383         }
00384         return *this;
00385 }
00386 
00387 template <class T>
00388 inline CArray2D<T>& CArray2D<T>::operator=(const T& M)
00389 {
00390         *m_pData=M;
00391         m_Origin=RAM;
00392         return *this;
00393 }
00394 
00395 template <class T>
00396 inline bool CArray2D<T>::IsEmpty() const
00397 {
00398         return (m_pData==NULL);
00399 }
00400 
00401 template <class T>
00402 inline ORIGIN CArray2D<T>::GetOrigin() const
00403 {
00404         return m_Origin;
00405 }
00406 
00407 template <class T>
00408 inline UINT32 CArray2D<T>::GetWidth() const
00409 { 
00410         return m_Width;
00411 }
00412 
00413 template <class T>
00414 inline UINT32 CArray2D<T>::GetHeight() const
00415 {
00416         return m_Height;
00417 }
00418 
00419 template <class T>
00420 inline bool CArray2D<T>::InRange(UINT32 x, UINT32 y) const 
00421 {
00422         return ((x<m_Width) && (y<m_Height));
00423 }
00424 
00425 template <class T>
00426 inline bool CArray2D<T>::InRange(const CPoint2D<UINT32>& P) const
00427 {
00428         return ((P.GetX()<m_Width) && (P.GetY()<m_Height));
00429 }
00430 
00431 template <class T>
00432 inline double CArray2D<T>::GetMinX() const
00433 {
00434         return 0;
00435 }
00436 
00437 template <class T>
00438 inline double CArray2D<T>::GetMinY() const
00439 {
00440         return 0;
00441 }
00442

00444 inline double CArray2D<T>::GetMaxX() const

00450 inline double CArray2D<T>::GetMaxY() const

00454 
00455 template <class T>
00456 inline CArray2D<T>::Iterator CArray2D<T>::Row(UINT32 i)
00457 {
00458         return Iterator(m_pData,slice(i,m_Width,m_Height));
00459         //return CArray2DIt<T>(m_pData,slice(i,m_Width,m_Height));
00460 }
00461 
00462 template <class T>
00463 inline CArray2D<T>::ConstIterator CArray2D<T>::ConstRow(UINT32 i) const
00464 {
00465         return ConstIterator(m_pData,slice(i,m_Width,m_Height));
00466 }
00467 
00468 template <class T>
00469 inline CArray2D<T>::Iterator CArray2D<T>::Column(UINT32 i)
00470 {
00471         return Iterator(m_pData,slice(i*m_Height,m_Height,1));
00472         //return CArray2DIt<T>(m_pData,slice(i*m_Height,m_Height,1));
00473 }
00474 
00475 template <class T>
00476 inline const CArray2D<T>::ConstIterator CArray2D<T>::ConstColumn(UINT32 i) const
00477 {
00478         return ConstIterator(m_pData,slice(i*m_Height,m_Height,1));
00479 }
00480 
00481 template <class T>
00482 inline void CArray2D<T>::Flush(const T& M)
00483 {
00484         operator=(M);
00485 }
00486 
00487 template <class T>
00488 inline const T& CArray2D<T>::operator()(const CPoint2D<UINT32>& P) const
00489 {
00490         return operator[](P.GetX())[P.GetY()];
00491 }
00492 
00493 template <class T>
00494 inline T& CArray2D<T>::operator()(const CPoint2D<UINT32>& P)
00495 {
00496         return operator[](P.GetX())[P.GetY()];
00497         //return 0;
00498 }
